comment: If you examine the reasons why the US targeted Libya for regime change and turned it into a failed state in the first place, it will become apparent that having strong, financially dependent countries in this region is not an option for the US war machine.

To put it simply, Nigeria has the potential to become Africa's first superpower. If theres one thing the last few decades has taught us, its that the US hates to see African nations developing on their own accord.
